name: Prometheus (Shinigami)
description:
-Description-

“Where am I?”

You are trapped inside the spaceship hovering along the endless Azathoth. Suddenly, unidentified creatures started to emerge from the darkness. They will destroy you repeatedly until you complete the assigned task. Score 1000 points to escape from this endless loop of the nightmare. ......Or will you?

-Features-

-Challenging enemy AI

-Eccentric space design

-Addictive gameplay

-Beautiful soundtrack offered by Youtuber 'YASUpochiGuitar' (songwriter of the famous horror game 'IB')

-Bio-

Shinigami is a solo game developer student digging her interest in the horror genre. 

Hi there, Prometheus is the first game I ever developed, please be forgivable for the lack of programming knowledge and some bugs. 

Thank you so much for playing my game!
